All Classes

Class
Description
Choice
Representation of the different choices a player can make during the game.
CompositeValidationRule
Abstract class to define the implementation of a validation rule that is the combination of other validation rules.
ConfigurationLoader
Class which loads configuration items from file for a game.
Creature
A creature in the game.
CreatureEncounter
Class which orchestrates a player encounter with a creature.
CumulativeProbability<T>
Generic class which randomly selects an object from a list of possibilities based on a defined probability.
Die
Representation of die that can be rolled to generate values.
DifficultyLevel
Class which stores information of difficulty levels for the game
DifficultyLevelConfiguration
Class to parse difficulty level configuration from a file.
DifficultyValidation
Class used to validate whether or not a user entered a valid difficulty level.
Dungeon
Class which initiates the application, Dungeons and Java.
Encounter
An encounter the player has throughout the game.
Event
Class which orchestrates the event phase of a players turn.
File
Representation of files available for input and output.
FileIO
Class to interact with files in the file system.
Game
A singleton class that stores the current game information.
GameConfiguration
Class which stores the configuration items for a game.
Input
Class to read input from the user entered to the console.
Inventory
Class which stores information about items in player's inventory
Item
Representation of items in the game
ItemEncounter
Class which orchestrates a player finding an item.
MakeChoice
Class used to interact with the player when choices are available to them.
MaxLengthValidation
Class used to store validation rule information to validate the maximum length of user input.
MinLengthValidation
Class used to store validation rule information to validate the minimum length of user input.
Monster
Class which stores the information of monster in the dungeon.
MonsterConfiguration
Class to parse monster configuration from a file.
Move
Class which orchestrates the movement phase of a players turn.
NoEncounter
Class which orchestrates actions a player may take where there is no encounter.
NotAllWhitespaceValidation
Class used to validate input that can not be all white spaces.
Parser<T>
A parser for a generic object read from file.
Player
Class which stores information of players of the game
PlayerCharacter
A player character in the game.
RNG
A random number generator used to get random numbers in a range and roll dice
RuleSet
Representation of rulesets available for validation of a user input.
StringLengthValidation
Class used to store validation rule information to validate a user input is between specified maximum and minimum lengths.
Turn
Class which orchestrates a player's turn.
TurnPhase
Abstract super class for the phases of a player turn.
ValidationRule
A rule used when validating user input.
Validator
Class which creates a validator that can be used to validate user input against specified validation rules.
YesOrNoValidation
Class used to validate input requiring a yes or no answer.
